column4: http://www.tatanka.com.br/ies4linux/ "This web site at www.tatanka.com.br has been reported as an attack site and has been blocked based on your security preferences."
I thought linux was supposed to be immune to viruses
very not true..... people just don't write viruses for linux.. that and you need sudo rights to run the virus
well if I visit the site and dont give my password...
